mapper.select: select model_type_id, model_type_name from model_type order by model_type_id
mapper.insert: insert into model(model_name, model_description, model_length, model_height, model_width, model_style, user_id, image_name, image_index) values(#{model_name}, #{model_description}, #{model_length}, #{model_height}, #{model_width}, #{model_style}, #{user_id}, #{image_name}, #{image_index})
mapper.update: update model set model_description = #{model_description}, image_name = #{image_name}, image_index = #{image_index}, updatetime = now() where model_id = #{model_id}
